channel.title: CVE Feed for DotNetZip -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DotNetZip -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-1002205|2024-09-16T18:23:53.751Z -- dotnetzip -- dotnetzip.semvered
item.description: DotNetZip.Semvered before 1.11.0 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
